something that sets them apart.

One world champion twice over.

So the name is well chosen

the car has got
some serious poke.

There we go, 100 miles an hour from

So, it has
the required performance

First up, the engine
is this 5-litre.
V8 four-way from the BMW M5.

It's brutal.

The chassis is made
of carbon fibre.
